text: Biratnagar () is a major industrial city and the second largest city in Nepal. Its geographical location is 26°28'60"N 87°16'60"E.Location of Biratnagar - Falling Rain Genomics The city is located in the Morang District in the Koshi Province of Nepal. It is the capital of the Koshi Province. ==Related pages== *Development Regions of Nepal *zones of Nepal ==References== Category:Cities in Nepal Category:Municipalities of Nepal
title: Biratnagar
